description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1a by a later hand. Physical description: 18 lines per page; written in small nastaʻliq with elements of shikastah in black on glazed, laid Arabic paper. Rubrication and catchwords; marginal notes. Mild staining; first leaf reinforced with newer paper. Origin: 1101 H [1689 or 1690], by Muḥammad Nabī (leaf 148a). Incipit: قوله الفقه في اللغة الفهم آه انما ابتدا بتعرىف الفقه دون اصول الفقه کما هو المعروف فى کتب الاصول لان وضع الکتاب انما هو في الفقه
author: Shīrwānī, Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan, -1687
abstract: Commentary on Ibn al-Shahīd al-Thānī's Maʻālim al-dīn wa-malādhdh al-mujtahidīn, a treatise on uṣūl al-fiqh.
extent: 149 leaves : paper ; 182 x 99 (115 x 46) mm bound to 183 x 105 mm
title: [Ḥāshiyat Mullā Mīrzā al-Shīrwānī bar Maʻālim].
provenance: The stamp of Muḥammad Jaʻfar ʻAbduh is present on leaves 1b, 2a, 147a-148a.
creator: شيرواني، محمد بن الحسن، -1687
subject: Ibn al-Shahīd al-Thānī, al-Ḥasan, 1551 or 1552-1602 or 1603—Maʻālim al-dīn wa-malādhdh al-mujtahidīn.
binding_note: Full brown leather with brown leather doublures; blind-stamped central mandorla containing partially worn writing and blind-stamped pendants; spine repaired with blind-stamped leather.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
